name: Shape Inspection
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Welcome! You are now a quantity inspector in the "bouncy ball" section of the toy factory. Your assignment is to pick the side of the factory that holds the most bouncy balls. However, you must also ignore any bouncy triangle duds that may come along. Good luck!

CONTROLS:

A or Left Arrow Key - Move left

D or Right Arrow Key - Move right

Space - Select side

CREDITS:

Code, Art - Jamchills

Font (Thaleah Fat) - Tinyworlds

Music - "Automation" by Eric Matyas soundimage.org
